description: This 3-layer waterproof and breathable pant protects you from foul weather for years to come. With a set of features normally found on spendier pants, this 3-layer pant packs into its own pocket and sports an elastic waist with drawcord adjustment, 3/4 side zips for maximum ventilation and easy on/off, and elastic cuffs to seal out foul weather–wherever you go.
name: Mountain Hardwear Threshold Pants, Short - Mens
